import { useState } from "react"; import { ChatInputBox, ReceivedMessage, SentMessage } from "../chat"; const ChatSection = () => { const [messages, sendMessage] = useState([ {body: `yeah hahaha some other comment why are you so awesome`}, `Here are the Tailwind Docs`, `Does that result in the raw svg being inlined in the DOM?`, `This is handy if you don't want to load SVG as a separate file.`, `This is handly if You Don't want to load as a separate SVG file`, "Exactly the same way as in Vue impulse", `I think it can slow down the page if there's too much bloat in the document. Compared to loading it externally.`, `Comparison would be better if it's not also comparing an vector svg to a raster gif, it's a difference in rendering too.`, ]); return ( //

*/}

); }; export default ChatSection;
